fields.headline: Best offers
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Bristol: Until January 31, the four-star Bristol Marriott Royal Hotel (0117 9255100) is offering one night's B&B for £25pp (two sharing), £20pp room-only. London: Until the end of February, the three-star Eden Park Hotel is offering three nights' B&B for the price of two when booked through the Hotel Directory (0870 2010123). The new price is £92pp (two sharing) and one child under 12 stays free (room-only) when sharing with parents. Stratford-upon-Avon: A two-night weekend break at the four-star Stratford Moathouse, plus an A-class ticket to either the Swan Theatre or the Royal Shakespeare Theatre costs from £98pp (two sharing) B&B . Discounted tickets for Warwick Castle are also available. RSC Short Breaks (020-8758 4799). France: Departing January 18, two nights' half-board at the 13th-century Ferme Auberge des Chartroux in Picardy costs £114pp (two sharing) including return Dover-Calais Channel crossings for car and passengers. Inntravel's Shortbreaks (01653 629001, inntravel.co.uk). France: Until the end of March, Eurobreak (020-8780 7700, eurobreak.com) is offering up to £50pp off three nights' B&B at the two-star Hotel Plaisance in NIce. £169pp with British Airways flights from London Heathrow, £199pp from Manchester. France: Until February 24 (excluding February 14 departures) four nights' B&B in a central Paris three-star hotel costs from £189pp (two sharing) including return travel from Waterloo or Ashford by Eurostar direct to Paris and comprehensive personal travel insurance. VFB Holidays (01242 240 310, vfbholidays.co.uk). Belgium: Two nights' B&B at the two-star Ter Reien hotel in Bruges costs £196pp for weekend BA departures from Gatwick up to March 31. Cresta Holidays (0870 1610900) . Same deal from Heathrow costs £200 or from Birmingham £197. Under £400 Cyprus: This month, Argo Holidays (0870 0667070) is offering seven nights' self-catering in the Geo-Tanya Complex from £219pp (two sharing) including return flights from Gatwick and transfers. Longer stays also available. Czech Republic: Inghams Lakes and Mountains (020-8780 4433, inghams.co.uk) is offering seven nights' half-board at the three-star Villa Eva in Marienbad from £305pp including flights from Stansted. Flights from other airports available. Hungary: Until the end of February, Kirker Holidays (020-7231 3333, kirkerholidays.com) is offering £177pp off the price of three nights' B&B at the five-star deluxe Hotel Corvinus Kempinski in Budapest. The new price, £389pp, includes flights. Similar deals to Istanbul Bilbao, Nice, Carcassone, Amsterdam and Madrid. Egypt: Discover Egypt (020-7407 2111, discoveregypt.co.uk) is offering a seven-night full-board Nile cruises departing January 14 for £399pp from January 21 and 28 for £429pp. The price includes return flights from Gatwick, taxes, transfers, 10 excursions and the services of an Egyptologist. Manchester flights £20pp extra. Under £1,000 Tunisia: Departing January 13, seven nights' half-board at the five-star Occidental in Hammamet costs £411pp (children under 12 £336) including scheduled flights from Gatwick, private transfers and a free room upgrade. Cadogan Holidays (023-808 28313). Bali: Until the end of March, seven nights' B&B at the Kuta Beach Club costs £499pp including Garuda International return flights from Gatwick and transfers. AsiaWorld (0870 9908098) . An extra seven nights costs £100. Canary Islands: Waymark Holidays (01753 516 477) is offering a seven-night walking holiday in La Palma departing February 9 for £565pp including return flights from Heathrow, transfers, half-board accommodation at the three-star Hotel Valle Aridane plus the services of an English-speaking leader. Cruise: Mediterranean Shipping Cruises (020-7637 2525) has cut the price of a seven-night full-board cruise from Rio de Janeiro plus one night's B&B in Rio from £1,545pp to £899pp including flights, port and airport taxes and transfers. Departing January 10, 17, 24 and 31 and February 14 and 21. Sri Lanka: Explore Worldwide (01252 760000, exploreworldwide.com) has two 16-day guided tours departing January 12 and 26 for £995pp including flights, all transportation and 15 nights' B&B accommodation. Over £1,000 Mauritius: Between May 1 and July 15, seven nights' half-board at the five-star Le Residence costs £1,475 per adult. Children up to 18 stay free. The price includes return flights from Gatwick, taxes, private transfers and most watersports. Ten nights costs £1,625pp. Rainbow Tours (020-7226 1004, rainbowtours.com). Cruise: Cruise Direct (020-8385 9000) has cut £4,280pp off the price of 19 nights on the six-star Harmony from Fort Lauderdale to Buenos Aires with a three-day stopover for the Rio Carnival. The new price for an outside cabin is £2,645pp including return flights from UK departing January 28, transfers, all taxes and full-board. Mexico: From March, Trips Worldwide (0117 3114400, tripsworldwide.co.uk) is offering a five-day deluxe rail journey in Mexico's Yucatán Penisula with a five-day beach holiday from £2,700pp (two sharing) including, flights, transfers, some meals and accommodation.
